tool_description: Calculates demographic-based lead scores using contact attributes like job title, seniority level, department, and geographic location.

job_title.description: Contact's current job title or role

seniority_level.description: Seniority level: entry, mid, senior, executive, c-level

scoring_weights.description: Custom weights for demographic factors (4 numbers for title, seniority, department, location)

error_messages: Invalid seniority level: Use one of [entry, mid, senior, executive, c-level].
Missing required demographic data: job_title and seniority_level must be provided.
Invalid scoring weights: Provide exactly 4 numbers that sum to 1.0.
Unrecognized job title format: Job title should be a descriptive role name.
usage: Provide job_title and seniority_level as minimum requirements. Include department and geographic_location for more accurate scoring. Customize scoring_weights to adjust factor importance.

component_scores.description: Individual scores for title, seniority, department, location

score_explanation.description: Explanation of how the demographic score was calculated
